mapper.sql: author_id, name, author_url, author_url_md5, post_num, post_age, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into author ( name, author_url, author_url_md5, post_num, post_age) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorUrlMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}) on duplicate key update name=values(name),post_num=values(post_num),post_age=values(post_age)

insert into author
author_id,
name,
author_url,
author_url_md5,
post_num,
post_age,
update_time,
#{authorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{authorUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{authorUrlMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{postNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{postAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update author
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author_url = #{authorUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author_url_md5 = #{authorUrlMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_num = #{postNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
post_age = #{postAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where author_id = #{authorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update author set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author_url = #{authorUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author_url_md5 = #{authorUrlMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_num = #{postNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, post_age = #{postAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where author_id = #{authorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
